orcid.create_or_connect: Create or connect to your ORCID
orcid.description_what_is_orcid: ORCID is an independent non-profit effort to provide an open registry of unique researcher identifiers and open services to link research activities and organizations to these identifiers.
orcid.login: Log in to your ORCID account or create new ORCID account
orcid.skip_this_step: Skip this step (can be configured in 'profile' later)
orcid.why: Why should I connect to ORCID?

roles.curator_description: A Curator is a person whom has access to approve and publish other researcher's work
roles.publisher_description: A Publisher is a person whom is employed at the organization. A publisher has also access to register their own publications
